text: 3.6 Gal 3.14, 3.28-29, Epe 2.13-19 Pen gos we gak anɨb ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Mɨñɨl binɨb Juda mel okok sek Juda binɨb okok sek, kɨli omɨŋal gɨl takaw teplep ak nɨg dɨpal. Nɨg dɨl, Klays Jisas nop jɨmñɨl lɨl nɨm, God tap teplep ne ñɨnɨgab aglak ak dɨnɨgabal. Pen omɨŋal gɨl kɨli jɨmñɨl wak nokom tek mɨdɨl, binɨb jɨj nokom tek mɨdebal.
